Actions.Name: Titanforged Greatbow
Actions.Effects: This weapon deals bonus damage and gains +1 boon against characters outside of cover.

Actions.Name: Bounding Leaps
Actions.Effects: If it lands on an object, it can repeat this flight once more.

Actions.Name: Hunter Arrow
Actions.Description: Mark an unoccupied space in range 8.
Actions.AreaEffect: Characters that enter that space are struck by a projectile, taking [D]+[fray] damage and ending this effect. The areas last until the end of the current round. After this effect is triggered or expires, create a height 1 great arrow object in an adjacent space.

Actions.Name: Bolt from the Blue
Actions.Description: The Jotunn fires a sheathe of arrows into the air, marks a foe in range 6, then rolls 1d6+1 for the number of arrows.
Actions.Mark: At the end of each turn, that foe takes 2 piercing damage, then reduces the number of remaining arrows by 1. Using this action again re-rolls the die, taking the new result, and can retarget the mark. If the number of arrows is reduced to 0, this mark and effect ends.

Actions.Name: Hone
Actions.Description: The next attack from this character is a critical hit on hit.
